content.html: If have a general #golang rule for the following code snippet. I like the first call to Claim over the second. General Rule: When the API is only returning an error value and you are not using the short variable declaration operator ( := ), question the choice.
content.value:
If have a general #golang rule for the following code snippet.

I like the first call to Claim over the second.

General Rule:
When the API is only returning an error value and you are not using the short variable declaration operator ( := ), question the choice.
